resources.string: Do you wish to authorize X?
This device has not yet been registered with our service. In order to proceed this device will have to be registered. Please register your device now.
This device is currently registered under a different user account. Please try again with a different device or contact our customer support below.

A device is already registered to this account. Please do the following:
 
 1. Click "Manage Devices" and delete your old device from your account
 2. Click the Sync Device button to add your new device
